title: Miley Cyrus shares photos from 'necessary mom and sister' trip
text:
Miley Cyrus shares photos from 'necessary mom and sister' trip originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Miley Cyrus is taking some time to relax after a chaotic past few months.

In August, the singer and Liam Hemsworth announced their split, and he filed for divorce shortly after. She then released an emotional track "Slide Away," which many believe is about their breakup.

(MORE: Miley Cyrus shows off new post-breakup tattoo at the VMAs)

Cyrus now appears to be taking some time to recharge, as she is currently on a "necessary mom and sister trip" in Arizona and Utah, following her performance at the iHeartRadio Music Festival in Las Vegas last weekend.

The star uploaded a number of snaps from her time with her mother, Tish, and sister, Brandi, exploring popular nature spots, including Antelope Canyon and Zion National Park.

"KEEP ON MOVIN’ KEEP CLIMBIN," she captioned one snap, referencing the lyrics to her popular 2009 song "The Climb."

Tish Cyrus described the trip as "pure magic" in another post.
